page.title: 06THE YACHT CLUB,PENARTH.
page.content: {Penarth yacht club}was founded in 1880 and is situated at the esplanade.The club house is a{Victorian building}of great{character.Dinghy racing}in the Enterprise class of boat is keenly contested by members.Junior members known as cadets are taught the skills of{sailing the Mirror class of dinghy. The club also has a{rowing section which race fine{racing shells}as used by river rowing clubs.The club has many of it's own boats including Pairs Fours,one Eight,and{Skulling boats. {Sailboarding}has also become a popular club activity with many members owning boards.The{Annual Regatta}included sailboarding races for the first time this year.Other races are for{Cruisers large sailing craft,often crewed by four or more crew,and dinghy races.The club has an active social programme and two full sized snooker tables.
